channel.title: How do I run this on LInux, particuliarly Ubuntu
channel.description: I have Ubuntu, and I have no idea how I am supposed to run this. I'm assuming I use the terminal, but what do I do?

item.title: How do I run this on LInux, particuliarly Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @Gravatrax Gravatrax
item.description:
@Gravatrax wrote:

what code? are you reffering to runMoparScape.bat?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2008, 08:08:04 AM[/size][hr]@echo off

title Running Bot

java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar; Bot 0

::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup

pause[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2008, 08:09:36 AM[/size][hr]ic opied it all in, it didn’t work
i copied all of the secodn still didn’t work!this makes NO sense[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2008, 08:11:12 AM[/size][hr]i copy and pasted it and it goes thruogh a list then says something like command not found, directory not found, etc. etc.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2008, 08:13:24 AM[/size][hr]you know what fuck this,
